title: Decanter
description: Medium thin glass. Small rounded foot curves out to projecting rounded base of body which rises in gradually decreasing diameter for three- fifth height of object. Abrupt shoulder curves to narrow neck, swelling slightly gold band, nearly effaced, on rim, and on upper surface of shoulder. Bottom of decanter is clear glass. Stopper is inverted drop- shaped with constricted neck and pointed at top. Cylindrical portion to fit into opening in clear glass ground.
